import sketches1Img from "./img/root/sketches1.jpg"; import sketches1MobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/sketches1_mobile.jpg"; import sketches2Img from "./img/root/sketches2.jpg"; import sketches2MobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/sketches2_mobile.jpg"; import designVariationsMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/DesignVariations_mobile.jpg"; import styleGuideImg from "./img/root/StyleGuide.jpg"; import styleGuideMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/StyleGuide_mobile.jpg"; import homePageImg from "./img/root/homePage.jpg"; import homePageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/home_page_mobile.jpg"; import birthdayFeatureImg from "./img/root/birthdayFeature.jpg"; import birthdayFeatureMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/birthdayFeature_mobile.jpg"; import sendMessageImg from "./img/root/sendMessage.jpg"; import sendMessageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/sendMessage_mobile.jpg"; import messagePageImg from "./img/root/messagePage.jpg"; import messagePageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/messagePage_mobile.jpg"; import memoryPageImg from "./img/root/memoryPage.jpg"; import memoryPageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/memoryPage_mobile.jpg"; import profilePageImg from "./img/root/profilePage.jpg"; import profilePageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/profilePage_mobile.jpg"; import improvement1Img from "./img/root/improvement1.jpg"; import improvement1MobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/improvement1_mobile.jpg"; import improvement2Img from "./img/root/improvement2.jpg"; const RootProject = () => { return ( Root Project | Portfolio {/* 상단 이미지 섹션 */}

Root

ROOT is a family social communication application that allows users to engage, connect, and share updates or news with their families abroad. Designed for easier accessibility for seniors.

Tools Used: Figma, Protopie
Team Mijili | SFU | IAT339

View Prototype
View Promo Video
{/* 상세 설명 섹션 */}

Idea & Interaction Framework

Based on our interview and research, our intended users are seniors over 75 years old who have family members living abroad. This app helps them feel connected to family, considering their geographical and physical limitations.

Persona

Persona 01: Judy

Judy is a 75-year-old single woman with children living in Japan and Seattle. She struggles with using technology and feels isolated, hoping to stay connected with her family.

Persona 02: Jason Smith

Jason is an 85-year-old who has family living in different time zones. He wants a messaging function that allows him to schedule messages to his family members.

Sketches

Initial sketches of the interface include menus for viewing family members’ profiles, sharing updates, and playing games with family members online.

Storyboard

The storyboard illustrates Judy using ROOT to schedule a message for her daughter in Japan, which arrives at an appropriate time the next day.

Design Variations

Various design themes were explored, focusing on ease of use for seniors. The final design incorporates larger buttons and icons for user accessibility.

Style Guide

The style guide features a warm color palette and a grid layout to enhance readability and usability for seniors.

User Flow

Home Page

The home page allows users to access family members’ profiles directly, with options for messaging, voice calls, and video calls.

Birthday Feature

Users are notified of family birthdays with a pop-up and a birthday cake icon. Frequently contacted family members can also be pinned for easier access.

Send Message

Users can send messages via text or speech, with options for scheduling messages based on the recipient’s time zone.

User Study Plan

A usability study with six participants highlighted design improvements, focusing on simplifying the message scheduling and group chat functions.

Improvements

Improvement 1

Group chat layouts were refined for consistency, and clearer icons for creating new groups were added.

Improvement 2

Message scheduling was redesigned to display the recipient’s local time, with a clearer option to customize the time.

Improvement 3

Memory sharing was enhanced by changing calendar icons to family profile images, with clear subheadings guiding users.

Our Observation

From testing our prototype over a video connection, we observed that it was harder to communicate our prototype to our participants than the study done in person. Especially with seniors, it was more challenging to show and explain the interface over the video call directly compared to our younger participants, who were familiar with applications like Discord and screen sharing.

); }; export default RootProject;
